Is there anything this man can’t do? The man of all seasons Ranveer Singh is winning everyone’s hearts ever since he stepped into the world of movies.

The Gully Boy star is back again with his unique dance form on Will Smith’s Men In black, and he did so in full on Bollywood style and you just cannot let your eyes off him. He is just uber cool in the video, it’s a must watch.
We all are aware of how Ranveer is an ardent fan of Will, he has always expressed his admiration for the Hollywood star. And of late, he even managed to grab Will's attention with his outstanding performance in Gully Boy. The exchange of words showed their admiration for each other.
